body.name: DeerValley Elongated One Piece Toilet, DV-1F0072 Square Compact Toilets for Bathrooms, Dual Flush 1/1.6 GPF and MaP 1000g, 12'' Rough-In Chair Height 16.93" Ceramic White Toilet With Soft Close Seat
features: Chair Height Compact Design: This elongated compact toilet measures 25 x 14.17 x 30.31 inches, this toilet bowl is perfect for small bathrooms. Its seat height of 16.93 inches makes it easy for those who find it difficult to get up from a low toilet.

Powerful & Clog-Free: Great maximum performance flush score of 1000 grams, siphon dual-flush, fully-glazed 2" trapway, 1.6 gallons of water for a full flush and 1 gallon of water for a light flush. Provides ample flushing power to ensure a clean, clog-free, leak-free, water-saving toilet.
Easy to Clean: Seamless fully skirted trapway design one piece toilet has no corners or grooves compared to other toilets, making it easy to clean.
Quiet to Use: The square modern toilets are designed with a soft-closing quick-release seat that closes gently and quietly, reducing noise during nighttime toileting.

Easy to Install: Two big opening holes on the side allows the plumber to install this dual flush toilet much easier. Package includes toilet, soft close toilet lid, pre-installed flush valve, premium wax ring, floor bolts, and installation instructions.

12 Months Warranty: We are committed to providing our customers with quality kitchen and bath products and a great shopping experience. If you are not satisfied with our products or encounter any problems, please feel free to email us through the platform and we will solve it for you in time.

Fully-Glazed 2" Trapway Not easily clogged, sticky stains. Quick-Release and Soft-Closed Seat Give you a quiet and convenient experience.
This toilet bowl is perfect for small bathrooms. Its seat height of 16.93 inches makes it easy for those who find it difficult to get up from a low toilet.

What is the rough in? It's a standard 12-inch rough-in toilet. What is the seat height? The seat height is 16.93 inches, providing a comfortable chair-like seating position. What is the bowl shape? It's square. Is the seat soft closing? Yes, our seat features soft-closing and quick-release mechanisms for added convenience. Is the trap fully glazed? Yes, the toilet's trapway is fully glazed, which helps prevent clogs and makes cleaning easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Toilets for Bathrooms
reviews.reviewText: The upgrade to my old, ineffective toilet was made possible by the installation of this device, and I couldn't be happier with the results. My attention was immediately drawn to the clean and contemporary style of the toilet. My bathroom received a touch of elegance from this fixture, which, thanks to its white finish and compact, elongated design, gave the impression of being more fashionable and welcoming. Not only does the design of the chair height seem appealing to the eye, but it is also quite pleasant to sit in. It is ideal for those individuals who like a toilet that is simpler to sit down on and stand up from, and it also creates an experience that is more easily accessible and user-friendly. When it comes to reducing the amount of water used in the toilet, the dual flush option is a game-changer. I think it's great that we have the choice to pick between a flush that holds one gallon for liquid waste and one that holds 1.6 gallons for solid trash. This not only helps to save water but also brings down the cost of my monthly water bill, so it's a win-win scenario for both the environment and my finances. The plush, enclosed seat is a seemingly little yet really pleasant feature. There will be no more disruptive slamming of the toilet seat in the wee hours of the morning. The total experience is elevated to a higher level of sophistication as a result, and the ambience is kept calm and undisturbed as a result.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It got crack on side and started leaking heavily.Very bad product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Toilet Is Gorgeous
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately, the skirting hit exactly the wrong place for my water valve, and installation would have required tearing out the wall and moving the valve. I wish I had thought to save the measurements to post here, because if I'd had them, I would have known not to order this one.The measurements that are on the spec sheet are accurate, FWIW. Just, if your valve is on the wall behind where the toilet is supposed to go, you may have the same problem unless you know for sure it's not going to hit the skirt. If your rough out is exactly 12 inches from the back wall and a side wall, and your valve is on the back wall near where the skirt might be, I would suggest going to a store where you can measure the actual toilet before buying.I do, however, recommend this brand. Everything about this toilet was gorgeous, and the company stands behind its products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Follow the installation instructions very closely but use common sense. We did not use the plastic cap or plastic washer that goes over the bolt. They are inside and the side covers hide them. It was very difficult to install. I would suggest hiring a plumber. It's very important to have plenty of space on both sides to guide the bolts through the holes of the porcelain on either side of the wax ring. Once it is set down and centered, it is a very sturdy toilet. It is not low to the ground and it is not too high it is the perfect height. My wife and I are 5'11". It cost $279 well worth the extra amount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Best toilet we have ever owned. Fairly easy to install and the perfect size for our tiny bathroom.
